text: Pen bɨ pɨlaj olap, kanɨb bɨbejɨl mɨgan adek ak besɨgak. Yɨb ne ak Yutikus. Abañ day ayaŋ mel, nab pel ak mel, day adek alaŋ mɨgan ayaŋ besɨg mɨdɨl, Pol takaw agaknɨŋ nɨg yek. Ne anɨgɨl nɨg mɨd mɨd, wɨsɨn kabɨyam yɨbɨl apek, wɨsɨn jɨkjɨk gɨ gɨ wɨsɨn kɨnak. Kɨnɨl, alaŋ nɨb gɨ dam lum ayaŋ pakek, am ayaŋ dɨl nɨgɨlak, pɨsnep kumɨl yek.
